edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class IntVbl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.IntVbl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntVbl.And, IntVbl.Max, IntVbl.Min, IntVbl.Or, IntVbl.Sum, IntVbl.Xor

    public class IntVbl
extends Tuple
implements Vbl
    Class IntVbl provides an integer reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement. An IntVbl is also a Tuple.

    Class IntVbl supports the parallel reduction pattern. Each thread creates a thread-local copy of the shared variable by calling the threadLocal() method of class Loop or the threadLocal() method of class Section. Each thread performs operations on its own copy, without needing to synchronize with the other threads. At the end of the parallel statement, the thread-local copies are automatically reduced together, and the result is stored in the original shared variable. The reduction is performed by the shared variable's reduce() method.

    The following subclasses provide various predefined reduction operations. You can also define your own subclasses with customized reduction operations.

    • Sum -- Class IntVbl.Sum
    • Minimum -- Class IntVbl.Min
    • Maximum -- Class IntVbl.Max
    • Bitwise Boolean and -- Class IntVbl.And
    • Bitwise Boolean or -- Class IntVbl.Or
    • Bitwise Boolean exclusive-or -- Class IntVbl.Xor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IntVbl.And
      Class IntVbl.And provides an integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean and as the reduction operation.
      static class  IntVbl.Max
      Class IntVbl.Max provides an integer reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  IntVbl.Min
      Class IntVbl.Min provides an integer reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  IntVbl.Or
      Class IntVbl.Or provides an integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  IntVbl.Sum
      Class IntVbl.Sum provides an integer reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.
      static class  IntVbl.Xor
      Class IntVbl.Xor provides an integer reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.

    • Method Detail

      • intValue

        public int intValue()
        Returns the integer value of this shared variable.

        The base class intValue() method returns the item field. A subclass may override the intValue() method to return something else.

        Returns:
        Integer value.

      • set

        public void set(Vbl vbl)
        Set this shared variable to the given shared variable. This variable must be set to a deep copy of the given variable.
        Specified by:
        set in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable. The two variables are combined together, and the result is stored in this shared variable. The reduce() method does not need to be multiple thread safe (thread synchronization is handled by the caller).

        The IntVbl base class's reduce() method leaves this shared variable unchanged.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if the class of vbl is not compatible with the class of this shared variable.
